definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: To detect the flammability resistance of vertical oriented fabrics or wool of weft and toy.
sentences.chinese: 燃燒性測試儀，可檢測織物及毛絨玩具豎向燃燒性能。

sentences.english: Giant toys and stuffed animals by Dutch artist Florentijn Hofman.
sentences.chinese: 荷蘭設計師設計的巨型毛絨玩具。

sentences.english: The Teddy bear is a stuffed toy bear for small children.
sentences.chinese: 填充毛絨玩具泰迪熊是孩子小負。

sentences.english: Get a stuffed dog or one of those new robot dogs.
sentences.chinese: 你可以買毛絨玩具，或那種機器狗也可以。

sentences.english: The Teddy Bear is a stuffed toy bear.
sentences.chinese: 泰迪熊是一種填充毛絨玩具熊。

sentences.english: Make sure they can take their favorite fuzzy bear with them.
sentences.chinese: 她說，“保證讓他們能帶着心愛的毛絨玩具熊。”

sentences.english: During the festival, soft toys will be given to those who buy the book.
sentences.chinese: 節日期間，購賣此書者搭頭送毛絨玩具。

sentences.english: Plush toys plus a bouquet of flowers. I am sure your girlfriend will be happy.
sentences.chinese: 毛絨玩具加一束鮮花，保管你女朋友心花怒放。

sentences.english: Yang specializes in 12 kinds of plush toys and mini-cars.
sentences.chinese: 楊春梅的工廠專營12種毛絨玩具和玩具車。

sentences.english: A soft toy was placed behind them.
sentences.chinese: 他們背後放置了一個毛絨玩具。

sentences.english: To soften the intensity of the input, use a favorite plash toy.
sentences.chinese: 要減弱輸入的強度，可以利用毛絨玩具。

definition: please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: to return something to its rightful owner
see 噼裡啪啦|噼里啪啦[pi1 li5 pa1 la1]
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
half a life/only half alive/barely alive/(scared, beaten etc) half to death
